Entries.Introduction: Have you seen my brother the Twizard?#$bHe recently visited me, and after returning to the woods where he resides, I have not heard from him.#$eMaybe that explorer who traverses the woods knows of his whereabouts.
Entries.Wed: I'm happy to have my brother as a guest, but since he hasn't been able to return home I have started to lose my patience.#$rAll these wizard jokes are simply too much for me.
Entries.Fri: #$q 10 Fri_alt#I wonder... Have you spoken with my brother yet?#$r 10 0 Fri_a1#Yes, he can't get into his house because the forest has become completely overgrown.#$r 11 0 Fri_a2#No, I havent found him.
Entries.Fri_alt: I wonder what could possibly cause the forest to grow this rampantly!#$rNot only that, but the rapid regrowth truly perplexes me...
Entries.Fri_a1: I see... a truly intriguing situation, but now I will have to help my brother with this mess.#$rI won't hear the end of his complaining!
Entries.Fri_a2: Hmm... I guess I'll just have to find him myself.
Entries.Forest: I believe there is magic at play here. It seems something from within the forest has caused this accelerated regrowth.
Entries.Mon: I hope we solve this overgrowth problem soon. I am afraid that if left unchecked, the forest could encroach upon the town.
